name: @botorjs/server
description: Library that of Botorjs is server

scripts.coverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register tests/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
scripts.coverage-ci: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register tests/**/*.test.ts && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: norton
